expandingtechnologies.ponder.railroad_li: The Railroad Light Controller can be used to make railroad crossings a little more beautiful.
To use it, attach a Display Link targeted at Nixie Tubes.
Then, just power the block with Redstone to turn the lights on.
You can use Train Observers to detect upcoming trains.
Connect them to a Powered Toggle Latch using Redstone Links to power the block.
